Riot needs to make a new quick selection for players going 0/4/0 or worse, a quick mute all feature to avoid toxic. Riot surely has enough information to know when people go toxic and should try to help shield players with some quick feature. 

This would be a step in the right direction in helping the player community not being what it is today.
